snippet.title: Helios Hotel: The Night Shift Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Helios Hotel: The Night Shift is a story-driven choose-your-own-adventure style horror game inspired by paranormal and slasher films. A playable demo is currently available to download on Steam.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3045330...

Background music by Seth_Makes_Sounds from https://freesound.org/
